reviewText: The add is all wrong. There are only two movies on this CD and the pictures are only fair. The sound is good, but only two movies, Shock and The Bat.
Barbara Steele is in two of the films. they may not be the best of the  horror genre, but these films still have a place in film history.

I love the movies, the scenery, the wall paper, the fabulous 60's creep factor in some. The caskets they use are awesome! They are full of grave robbers, mad doctors,  intense scenery, and old school fright! I recommend for any who like Vincent Price, Barbara Steel, and Bela Lugosi. Love it!!
